Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-CoV-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Analyte(s): SARS-CoV-2 RNA (E gene, N2 gene, RdRP gene)
Specimen Container(s): Becton Dickinson Universal Viral Transport Kit P/N 220531
Copan eNAT® Molecular Collection and Preservation Medium P/N 6U074S01
Copan eNAT® Molecular Collection and Preservation Medium P/N 6U073S01
Viral transport medium (Copan P/N 3C047N, BD Universal Transport Medium, Remel M4RT, Remel M5)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert Xpress CoV-2 plus rapid RT-PCR test for qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA on GeneXpert Xpress System.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid real-time RT-PCR test for qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in nasopharyngeal and anterior nasal swab specimens from individuals with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, to aid diagnosis of COVID-19 in conjunction with other clinical findings.
